title: ## Reading List: Financial Opinion Mining & Financial Opinions
This list covers a range of topics, from sentiment analysis and opinion mining techniques to applications in financial markets and investor behavior
**Sentiment Analysis & Opinion Mining Techniques:**
**"Sentiment Analysis: A Comprehensive Guide"** by Bing Liu
- A foundational text on sentiment analysis, covering various techniques and applications
- A survey of opinion mining techniques, focusing on lexicon-based and machine learning approaches
**"A Survey of Text Mining Techniques for Financial Applications"** by S.P
- Explores text mining techniques for financial analysis, including sentiment analysis
**"Financial Sentiment Analysis: A Review"** by A.S
- Reviews various sentiment analysis techniques applied to financial data
**"Deep Learning for Sentiment Analysis: A Survey"** by Maite Taboada et al
- Explores the use of deep learning for sentiment analysis, including its application in finance
**Financial Applications of Opinion Mining:**
**"Financial Opinion Mining: A Survey"** by M.A
- A comprehensive survey of financial opinion mining, covering various applications and challenges

author.given: Predicting Stock Price Movements Using Twitter Sentiment"

title: - Explores the use of Twitter sentiment to predict stock price movements
**"Financial News Sentiment and Stock Price Movements: An Empirical Investigation"** by A
- Examines the relationship between financial news sentiment and stock price movements
**"The Impact of Social Media on Financial Markets: A Review"** by M.A
- Reviews the impact of social media on financial markets, including sentiment analysis
**"Financial Sentiment Analysis: A Machine Learning Approach"** by A.S
- Applies machine learning techniques to financial sentiment analysis
**Investor Behavior & Financial Opinions:**
- Examines the relationship between investor sentiment and stock returns
- Explores the psychological factors influencing investor behavior and financial markets
**"Behavioral Finance: A Review"** by M.J
- Reviews the field of behavioral finance, focusing on cognitive biases and their impact on financial decisions

**"The Role of Investor Sentiment in Asset Pricing"** by R.J
- Explores the role of investor sentiment in asset pricing and market bubbles
**Other Relevant Articles:**
- Proposes a framework for financial opinion mining, including data collection, preprocessing, and analysis
**"Financial Opinion Mining: Challenges and Opportunities"** by A.S
- Discusses the challenges and opportunities in financial opinion mining
**"The Use of Sentiment Analysis in Financial Markets: A Critical Review"** by A.S
- Provides a critical review of sentiment analysis in financial markets
**"Financial Opinion Mining: A Data-Driven Approach"** by M.A
- Explores a data-driven approach to financial opinion mining
- Discusses the future of financial opinion mining, including emerging trends and challenges

**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and there are many other relevant articles available. You can use search engines like Google Scholar and research databases like JSTOR to find more articles on specific topics
